about_the_game:
This is a Simulation type game with focus on physically handling items that you transport and trade through a stylized Medieval Environment.

Over 350+ Hours, 78 Bug Fixes/Improvements, 39 Updates since Demo Launch. 

By Player request these features have been added:

  • Sleeping

  • Cooking (testing)

  • Additional Traders

  • Save/Quick Reload

  • Music

A MERCHANT'S PROMISE DEMO is a light introduction into the game world featuring:

  • 2 Towns to trade between

  • A few committable crimes

  • Temporary Prison/Quarry

  • Item degradation via weather and collisions

  • Player House with a few furniture pieces

  • Basic Cart with 2 small free upgrades

  • Player Trade Area in both Towns

  • Handful of different Items to buy/sell/trade

  • Quicker Status Effects from Worthless Merchant -> King's Merchant

The game is set to launch on March 21st, 2025 after Steam Next Fest. I would love your help in getting it there! This is a great way to gather YOUR valued positive and negative feedback ensuring I'm heading in the right direction with this game's development!

Moving forward priorities are on: Reliable Gameplay, More life to the overall game world, Better Animations, Villager Interactions, More Laws/Crimes, Cart/Wagon Selection and Upgrades.

* I am in the DISCORD for BUG REPORTING/ISSUE TRACKING as well as community feedback, comments, and a heads up as I drop updates & patches throughout the week!

Experience Weather:

Weather can affect the condition of items. Items that are exposed can become damaged.

Transport Goods:

"No Inventory" gameplay means physically moving all your goods!

Buy/Sell/Trade:

Complete transactions by placing the items on the table along with any coin needed.

Earn Money:

You can sell to Merchants or Villagers. Each will pay more based on the origin of the item.

Place Household Items:

You can practice placing some basic furniture items and using your home to store goods should you want to hang on to them and sell later when prices change!
